comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The father, Charles Evans Hughes Sr. (1862-1948): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Evans_Hughes www.calvin-coolidge.org/html/charles_evans_hughes.html His wife was Ellen Antoinette Carter Hughes (1864-1945). Charles Evans Hughes Jr. (1862-1961)--the college student in the oval: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Evans_Hughes,_Jr. Helen Hughes (1892-1920), one of the daughters in the top photo, was a Vassar alumna who worked for the YWCA; died at age 28 (some sources give TB as the cause, others says the 1918 influenza was the start of her health decline); kihm4.wordpress.com/2008/08/22/helen-hughes-memorial-chapel/ Other daughters in the top photo are Elizabeth Hughes (1907-1981) and Catherine Hughes (1898-1961).
